message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start!
I'll give you 4000, but I think I deserve more for being the better negotiator
I'll give you a slightly better deal, but you still need to compromise
I'll give you 4800, but I think I deserve more for being more patient
I'll meet you halfway, but I'm not giving in too much
I'll give you 4600, but I think I deserve more for being the last one to make an offer
